data.text: One day, while training in preparation for an upcoming race.
Haa, haa……… fuu.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
My time has gotten better, hasn't it? In addition to that, 
it feels like I catch my breath a little bit faster after running.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: We're making good progress through the menu too!
choices.processed: <size=32>We're making good progress through the menu too!</size>

choices.text: We're making good progress through the menu too!
choices.processed: <size=32>We're making good progress through the menu too!</size>

data.text:
Thank you very much. Well then- 
to make the best use of time, I will continue.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
As soon as I praise her, she returns to thinking about training. 
Just like she said, she was making use of that time. 
Her concentration was incredible.

choices.text: That concentration is one of your stengths
choices.processed: <size=39>That concentration is one of your stengths</size>

choices.text: That concentration is one of your stengths
choices.processed: <size=39>That concentration is one of your stengths</size>

data.text:
Strength, is it? …Oh, no. While I'm honored you think that, 
I've never given it much thought before. I'm just… a little surprised.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
Looks like she hasn't really given it much thought before. 
This is probably one of the strongest factors behind her resolve―

As I'm sure you're already aware. 
…I was born with a frail, extremely weak body.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
There's no telling when my body will break down. 
It's even possible that in the brilliant history of the Mejiro family, 
or even that of Uma Musume, I may quickly be forgotten.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
Quickly fading, or quickly forgotten. 
-Even still, "Right now".
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
Right now, in this moment, to shine brilliantly 
even at the cost of my life, is the one right still permitted me.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
On that day, of her own volition, she explained her situation to me, 
quietly… but there was an unwavering determination within.

Trainer-san, my preparations are complete. 
I'm ready for the last one, please.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
-Eh? How many of those has Ardan-senpai done? 
-She's doing more training than before isn't she? Is her body okay?
data.name: Spectating Horsegirls

data.text: From the nearby spectating kouhai, I heard some voice their concern, but―

Haa, haa…… 
……Yeah, this feels fine…
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: (It's fine, she can still keep going)

data.text: Trainer-san? Is there something wrong?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: In this condition, I wonder if adding more would be fine
choices.processed: <size=30>In this condition, I wonder if adding more would be fine</size>

data.text:
……! Absolutely, please do. 
I think I want to keep running a bit more, too.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
For today too, thank you very much. 
Today's training, was much more fruitful than before I believe.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
That's why… if it's alright. Starting tomorrow, how about making 
this the normal training menu?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: I was thinking the same thing.

data.text:
Oh! …Fufuu. I guess I have to be thankful for "now". 
Lately, it seems like my condition has gotten better. 
I don't get so feverish I can't move anymore.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
Before my debut, I wasn't able to train on consecutive days. 
However, now, it's as you can see.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
With her in good health and high spirits, our meeting ended. 
But, it didn't seem she was ready to relax just yet, as she was 
still standing straight.

choices.text: Why don't you relax a bit more?
Why don't you relax a bit more?

data.text: Relax… what do you mean?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: How about sitting down or laying on the sofa?
choices.processed: <size=36>How about sitting down or laying on the sofa?</size>

data.text:
Oh, thank you very much. 
However, staying like this feels a bit more natural for me.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
Oh, Ardan-chan, why are you in that corner? 
Are you, perhaps, feeling unwell?
data.name: Female Acquaintance

data.text: No, Auntie. I was just thinking about something…
data.name: Young Ardan

data.text:
You shouldn't force yourself. 
You've got such a frail body after all……!
data.name: Female Acquaintance

data.text:
(……I see. I should stand properly, 
otherwise they might think I'm feeling sick…)
data.name: Young Ardan

data.text:
No, it's nothing. Staying like this helps calm me down, 
so please don't worry.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
Trainer-san, I'll promise not to push myself too hard when 
you're around, so please, rest assured.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know
choices.processed: <size=30>Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know</size>

choices.text: Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know
choices.processed: <size=30>Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know</size>

data.text:
Oh… if you were to pamper an Uma Musume, wouldn't it 
interfere with your work, Trainer-san?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

data.text:
Perhaps I might say: "Today, I'm not feeling too good so I'm 
going to take the day off." Something like that, you know?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: N-Not when it comes to training!
N-Not when it comes to training!

data.text:
Fufuu… of course, I ask that you don't. 
I'll be fine, right now I've been more than taken care of.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: (If she's going to say that, I'll leave it to her…)
choices.processed: <size=35>(If she's going to say that, I'll leave it to her…)</size>

data.text:
After seeing Mejiro Ardan with a refreshed smile on her face, 
I decided not to say anything more.
